articles.title: Late Wynter makes James Madison fall, Drexel prevails 78-71
articles.description: HARRISONBURG, Va. (AP) — Camren Wynter scored seven of his 17 points from the free throw line in the final 30 seconds to help as Drexel beat James Madison 78-71 on Saturday.
articles.content:
HARRISONBURG, Va. (AP) Camren Wynter scored seven of his 17 points from the free throw line in the final 30 seconds to help as Drexel beat James Madison 78-71 on Saturday.

articles.title: Georgia Southern beats Louisiana-Lafayette 71-51
articles.description: STATESBORO, Ga. (AP) — Isaiah Crawley and Elijah McCadden scored 13 points apiece as Georgia Southern stretched its home win streak to eight games, beating Louisiana-Lafayette 71-51 on Saturday.
articles.content:
STATESBORO, Ga. (AP) Isaiah Crawley and Elijah McCadden scored 13 points apiece as Georgia Southern stretched its home win streak to eight games, beating Louisiana-Lafayette 71-51 on Saturday.

articles.title: Clemson stuns UNC 79-76 in OT, earns 1st win in Chapel Hill
articles.description: CHAPEL HILL, N.C. (AP) — Aamir Simms hit an overtime-forcing 3-pointer with 3.5 seconds left in regulation and Clemson went on to erase decades of futility at North Carolina by beating the Tar Heels 79-76 on Saturday, earning their first…

articles.title: In Mexican capital, red shoes to protest killings of women
articles.description: MEXICO CITY (AP) — Stiletto heels. Clogs. Trainers. Tiny, child-size Crocs.
articles.content:

articles.description: SYRACUSE, N.Y. (AP) — Syracuse coach Dino Babers named Zach Arnett as the Orange's new defensive coordinator on Saturday.
articles.content:

Arnett joins the Orange after serving as defensive coordinator and linebackers coach at San Diego State the past two seasons.
